name: Trifles (ludirature)
description:
Come see Trifles by Susan Glaspell, presented by the USCB Department of English, the Arts, and Interdisciplinary Studies in Campus Center 105 on Mar 30 and 31 at 7:30 pm. The show is free. In the meantime, enjoy this playable flyer for the show!

Controls (keyboard):

Exploration Mode:

Move- Arrow keys

Change character- Start button- Enter

Point-And-Click Mode

Move Cursor- Arrow keys

Click on object-A button-  'Z'

Return to previous scene-B button- 'X' 

(Try clicking on any interesting details)

This interactive preview provides an playable adaptation of the play. Search around the house and interact with the everyday objects inside. Try to find the small details that tell the real story. And if you get stuck, you might just need a new perspective.
